about_the_game:
- Hot springs story
And so begins the competition between Fairy Tail members as they try to reach the mysterious secret springs. In this episode of slapstick comedy, the members wander the area battling their comrades.
- Exciting new battle experiences
These will include battles between the members of Fairy Tail, along with battles between teams made up of playable characters that can only be experienced in DLC.

The save data for the completed game is necessary to access this content.

Note:
- Please see the official site for more details.
- This product is eligible content for the "FAIRY TAIL 2 Season Pass." Please be careful not to make duplicate purchases.
